string.a: What to do if you are sick

string-array.name: majDiseaseSpinner
string-array.item: I do not have any of the listed health conditions
I have 1-2 of the listed health conditions
I have 3+ of the listed health conditions

string-array.name: sanitationSpinner
string-array.item: I have abundant/stable access to sanitation supplies
I have minimal access to sanitation supplies
I do not have access to sanitation supplies

string-array.name: minDiseaseSpinner
string-array.item: I do not have any of the listed health conditions
I have 1-2 of the listed health conditions
I have 3+ of the listed health conditions

string-array.name: jobSpinner
string-array.item: I rarely work face to face with others
I often work face to face with others

string-array.name: pastDiseaseSpinner
string-array.item: I have never had any of the listed health conditions
I have had 1-2 of the listed health conditions in the past
I have had 3+ of the listed health conditions in the past

string-array.name: prevIntSanSpinner
string-array.item: Most/every person took proper sanitation measures
Some people took proper sanitation measures
Only a few people took proper sanitation measures
No people took proper sanitation measures

resources.string: Below you will be asked a series of questions in three separate categories to assess your risk of COVID-19 infection.\n\n*ALL ENTERED DATA IS ANONYMOUS*

Use the drop down menus to answer the following questions about your interaction. Responses are automatically logged and displayed on the Interactions Tab after refreshing the page.\n\n*ALL ENTERED DATA IS ANONYMOUS*

Minor Symptoms
Fever or chills
Cough
Difficulty breathing 
Fatigue
Muscle or body aches
Headache
New loss of taste or smell
Sore throat
Congestion or runny nose
Nausea or vomiting
 Diarrhea

Severe Symptoms
Severe trouble breathing
Persistent pain in chest
New confusion
Inability to wake or stay awake
Bluish lips or face
